data.title: Big Powers
data.statement:
Given two integers [[a]] and [[b]] find the first three digits of [[a]] raised to the power of [[b]].

For example:
if [[a]] = 7 and [[b]] = 5 then [[a]]^[[b]] = 7^5 = 16807 the output will be 168

<<Note:>> if the result is less than three digits just print those digits.
data.outputDescription: An integer that represents the first three digits of [[a]]^[[b]]
